translation.en: [narrator] Though many know the tragic love story of Antony and Cleopatra,
translation.zh:
‎尽管很多人都知道安东尼和
‎克里奥佩特拉的悲剧爱情故事

translation.en: the wayward Roman general
who fell madly in love with the enchanting Egyptian queen,
both of them taking their lives
rather than face a world without each other,
few know the secret story
of the most sought-after prize and unsolved puzzle of their time.
translation.zh:
‎无数人都在找寻
‎他们那个时代的宝物和未解之谜

translation.en: The mystery of Cleopatra's third egg.
translation.zh: ‎克里奥佩特拉神秘的第三颗蛋

translation.en: On their wedding day, as a symbol of his undying devotion,
translation.zh:
‎在他们婚礼当天
‎为了展现他永恒的忠诚

translation.en: Mark Antony presented Cleopatra with three bejeweled eggs,
translation.zh:
‎马克安东尼送给克里奥佩特拉
‎三颗缀满珠宝的蛋

translation.en: each one more exquisite than the last.
For centuries, these eggs were thought to be nothing more than myth, rumor.
translation.zh:
‎几十个世纪以来
‎人们都以为那只是神话传说

translation.en: But then, in 1907,
just outside of Cairo, a local farmer unearthed two of them.
translation.zh:
‎开罗城外一个当地农民
‎从地里挖出了其中两颗蛋

translation.en: Some say the third egg was never found.
translation.zh: ‎有人说第三颗蛋从未有人找到过

translation.en: Others claim it was discovered,
but just as quickly lost, never to be seen again.
translation.zh: ‎但很快又消失了 从此再未现身

translation.en: Join us as we explore that very question.
translation.zh: ‎和我们一起来探究这个问题吧

translation.en: What happened to Cleopatra's lost egg?
translation.zh: ‎克里奥佩特拉丢失的蛋到底怎么了？

translation.en: Who may hold it in their possession?
And most importantly, will we ever see the day in which
translation.zh: ‎最重要的是 是否能有这么一天

translation.en: all three eggs are reunited for the first time in over 2,000 years?
translation.zh: ‎让三颗蛋在两千多年后首次重聚？

translation.en: Cleopatra's first egg is on display for all to see
at the world-famous Museo Nazionale di Castel Sant'Angelo in Rome.
translation.zh:
‎在世界闻名的
‎罗马圣天使城堡国家博物馆展出

translation.en: The second egg has been sold at auction numerous times
and currently is held in a private collection.
You're not a cop.
You're right, I'm not.
You know what I mean, Agent. Your badge is no good here.
translation.zh:
‎你懂我的意思 探员
‎你的警徽在这儿不管用

translation.en: So no American cowboy stuff.
Don't worry. Left my chaps at home.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 我把皮套裤放家里了

translation.en: You sure about this?
I know how he thinks. He's gonna do it today. Trust me.
translation.zh:
‎我知道他是怎么想的
‎他今天会动手 相信我

translation.en: All right, then, here we go.
-[man in English] Impossible. -I'm not asking.
translation.zh:
‎-不可能
‎-我不是在问你的意见

translation.en: You need to shut the museum down, evacuate your visitors,
translation.zh: ‎你需要关闭博物馆 疏散游客

translation.en: and seal all ingress and egress points immediately.
And Interpol has the authority to compel me to do so?
translation.zh: ‎国际刑警有权强迫我这么做？

translation.en: Don't test me, Director.
You should listen to her.
And who are you? Her bodyguard?
This is Special Agent John Hartley of the FBI's Behavioral Analysis Unit.
translation.zh:
‎他是美国联邦调查局行为分析小组
‎特别探员约翰哈特利

translation.en: He's a consulting profiler who specializes in art crime.
translation.zh: ‎他是专攻艺术品犯罪的顾问侧写员

translation.en: You don't look like a profiler.
Yeah, I get that a lot.
Forty-one hours ago, Agent Hartley received credible intelligence that
translation.zh:
‎41小时前
‎哈特利探员收到可靠情报

translation.en: the most wanted art thief in the world, a man named Nolan Booth,
translation.zh: ‎说世界头号艺术品窃贼 诺兰布斯

translation.en: intends to steal the Egg of Cleopatra today.
translation.zh: ‎打算今天来偷克里奥佩特拉的蛋

translation.en: Who provided you this information?
The Bishop.
You cannot be serious.
My dear, The Bishop is nothing more than a boogeyman story in the art world.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 主教不过是
‎艺术界的恶人传说

translation.en: It's a catch-all concept. It's someone to blame
translation.zh: ‎是一个泛称 你和你的执法圈朋友们

translation.en: when you and your friends in law enforcement
are too incompetent to solve the case.
Listen to me, unless we stop it, that egg is gonna be stolen today.
translation.zh:
‎听我说 如果现在不停止争论
‎那颗蛋今天就会被偷走

translation.en: In fact, it may already be gone.
[in English] Already gone, you say?
Now, if you'll excuse me, Inspector, I believe I owe your supervisor a call.
translation.zh:
‎请容我失陪 警官
‎我想我需要给你上司打个电话

translation.en: Do you have thermal sensors in this room?
-Of course we do. -Show it to me.
[director] You're wasting our time.
What, may I ask, are you looking for?
translation.zh: ‎我可以问一下 你在找什么吗？

translation.en: Well, you see, Cleopatra's first egg is covered in 18-karat gold.
translation.zh:
‎你看 克里奥佩特拉的第一颗蛋
‎表面覆盖有18K黄金

translation.en: And gold reflects radiation.
That egg should be reflecting the heat in this room.
translation.zh: ‎那颗蛋应该会反射这个房间里的热能

translation.en: It should be red, not blue.
It's probably just an error in the thermal sensor.
Well, there's only one way to find out.
Hey, sorry, big man, but there's no food or drink in the museum.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 抱歉 小伙子
‎博物馆里禁止饮食

translation.en: Thank you.
No, no, wait a moment. What do you think you're doing?
translation.zh: ‎不 等等 你在干什么？

translation.en: [woman] Relax, it's fine. He knows what he's doing.
translation.zh: ‎别紧张 他知道自己在做什么

translation.en: Seal the room. Now!
Move! Move!
He's heading for the exit.
Freeze!
[guard 1 in Italian] He is here. Send reinforcements.
He's on the scaffolding.
We're gonna need more-- [grunts]
I know you. You're the… You're the slow bald guy that's been chasing me.
translation.zh:
‎我认识你 你是… ‎你是那个一直在追我
‎慢吞吞的秃子

translation.en: What do you got in the bag?
You're American. What brings you to Rome?
translation.zh: ‎你是美国人 来罗马干什么？

translation.en: Gelato, the Colosseum.
-Oh, it's beautiful. Beautiful place. -Yeah.
-First time? -Yep.
[Booth] That was a fun foot chase, right? Lots of twists and turns. Hijinks.
translation.zh:
‎刚才的追逐很有趣吧？
‎一波三折 一路狂欢

translation.en: Who knew it'd end up like this?
-I did. -Right.
Fun's over, Nolan Booth. Give me the bag, turn around,
translation.zh:
‎游戏结束了 诺兰布斯
‎把包给我 转身

translation.en: put your hands behind your back. You're under arrest.
translation.zh: ‎双手放到身后 你被捕了

translation.en: Okay. Well, hold on one sec. I just have two questions.
translation.zh: ‎好的 稍等 我有两个问题

translation.en: Okay. Um…
First question, where'd you get that jacket?
translation.zh: ‎第一个问题 你的外套哪里买的？

translation.en: It's a statement piece.
Somewhere there is a very nude cow whispering… [whispers] …"Worth it."
translation.zh:
‎肯定有一头没皮的牛
‎在某个地方低声说：“物有所值”

translation.en: And number two, on the whole arresting me thing, I totally get it.
translation.zh:
‎第二个问题
‎关于逮捕我这件事 我完全理解

translation.en: You know, baby did a bad, bad thing. Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎本宝宝做了件大坏事 是的

translation.en: But you don't happen to have, like, a badge or somethin'
translation.zh: ‎但你不会刚好有警徽之类的东西

translation.en: tucked away in the turtleneck, do you?
I don't need to show you my badge because I've got a gun.
translation.zh: ‎我没必要给你看警徽 因为我有枪

translation.en: Here's the thing. You're putting me in a pickle.
translation.zh: ‎是这样 你让我有点难办

translation.en: Without identification, how do I know who you are?
translation.zh: ‎没有证件 我怎么知道你是谁？

translation.en: For all I know, you could be the bad guy,
translation.zh: ‎从我的角度看 你也有可能是坏人

translation.en: and I could be the other bad guy.
You're right. I am the bad guy.
Now shut up and give me the bag before I shoot you in the mouth.
translation.zh:
‎现在闭上嘴 把包给我
‎不然我就喂你吃颗子弹

translation.en: -I'm gonna give this to you. -[Hartley] Good.
Yeah, I'm just gonna give it to you 'cause I don't even want it.
translation.zh: ‎给你就是了 我也不是很想要

translation.en: For the record, none of this feels good.
translation.zh: ‎我得说 这体验一点都不好

translation.en: Booth, don't move!
Come on, let's go.
What the hell?
Where are you going?
Asshole!
[in English] Can you hold on to this for me?
-Thanks. -[sputtering]
[in Italian] What the hell? You idiot! Are you blind?
[Hartley in English] Nice place you got here.
Special Agent John Hartley, FBI. We met earlier.
translation.zh:
‎我是美国联邦调查局特别探员
‎约翰哈特利 我们之前见过

translation.en: Aren't you a little outside your jurisdiction?
translation.zh: ‎你是不是有点超出管辖范围了？

translation.en: I am.
Good thing these guys aren't.
Hi, guys. Don't take your shoes off or anything.
You sure you brought enough guns?
What can I say? I like to be thorough.
translation.zh: ‎我能说什么呢？我喜欢准备充分

translation.en: [Booth] No way, José.
-The intrepid Inspector Das. -[scoffs]
I wouldn't have missed this for the world. I'll take that. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎我可不想错过这个场面
‎给我吧 谢谢

translation.en: -It's nice to meet a fan. -[Das] Oh, that's cute.
You wanna know what else is cute?
translation.zh: ‎你知道还有什么可爱的事情吗？

translation.en: Because you're wanted in 18 separate countries,
translation.zh: ‎因为你在18个不同国家被通缉

translation.en: I get to choose which one of them detains you until trial,
translation.zh: ‎我要选一下在审判前把你拘留在哪里

translation.en: given your escape history.
What are you, six for six now?
Yeah. One more and I get a Shawshank jacket.
translation.zh:
‎对 再逃脱一次
‎我就能获得一件肖申克外套

translation.en: Keep making your jokes
because I'm about to send you to the worst place in the world.
translation.zh:
‎因为我马上就要
‎送你去世界上最糟糕的地方

translation.en: Your Instagram account?
You know, I'm really starting to not like you.
Oh, come on!
Not like me? You don't even know me.
We could have a lot in common.
[scoffs] Maybe I don't know you, but I've been building a profile on you,
translation.zh:
‎也许我不认识你
‎但我在为你撰写档案

translation.en: ever since you stole William Strang's Lady with a Red Hat from the Tate
translation.zh:
‎自2014年你从泰特美术馆偷了
‎威廉斯特朗的《戴红帽子的女士》起

translation.en: back in 2014.
You can't prove that was me.
I got that on Etsy.
I've been tracking your scores for a while.
translation.zh: ‎我追踪你的情况有一段时间了

translation.en: So let me take a crack at who I think you really are.
translation.zh: ‎让我来说说你究竟是个怎样的人

translation.en: Sure thing. Yeah.
-Only child. -Mmm-hmm.
[Hartley] Dad's a Swiss cop, Mom's an American professor.
translation.zh: ‎爸爸是瑞士警察 妈妈是美国教授

translation.en: You started stealing between the ages of six and eight.
translation.zh: ‎你在六到八岁就开始偷东西

translation.en: You found out you had a real talent for it.
It made you feel special, different.
You like to work alone. You don't like a team.
translation.zh: ‎你喜欢独自作战 不喜欢团队

translation.en: The only jobs you take are the ones that make the big, splashy headlines,
which tells me that you only do it for the thrill and not the money.
translation.zh:
‎这说明你作案只是为了刺激
‎而不是为了钱

translation.en: Are you insane? I love the money.
I'm not done yet. I'm just getting to the good part.
translation.zh:
‎我还没说完
‎马上就要说到精彩的地方了

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
A lot of thieves out there who claim to only do it for the money.
That's not unusual.
But what is unusual is the risk that you take.
translation.zh: ‎但不正常的是 你为此承担的风险

translation.en: The chances.
It's as though you wanna get caught so you can escape,
translation.zh: ‎仿佛你是为了逃脱才想被抓到

translation.en: just to prove yourself all over again,
and prove that you're better than everybody else
and that you're worthy.
Worthy of what? This speech?
Your father's love.
Congratulations.
How'd you find me?
Well, the same way I knew that you were gonna steal the egg in Rome.
translation.zh: ‎和知道你要去罗马偷蛋的途径一样

translation.en: [whispers] The Bishop.
[whispers] The Bishop.
[normally] Get him ready to move.
Booth, I'm curious.
How does it feel to be sold out by the most wanted art thief in the world?
translation.zh:
‎被世界头号
‎艺术品窃贼出卖的感觉如何？

translation.en: I'm the most wanted art thief in the world.
translation.zh: ‎我才是世界头号艺术品窃贼

translation.en: You were.
[Das] Wait. Wait here.
There's no chance I'm putting that thing in the same van as him.
translation.zh: ‎我不可能把那玩意和他放在一辆车上

translation.en: -See you at the airfield. -I'll see you there.
[in English] Door open.
All right. We're good.
Thank you.
Hi, there.
-You leaving town? -[Hartley] Flight's in an hour.
translation.zh:
‎-你要走了？
‎-飞机一小时后起飞

translation.en: Something up?
You could say that. Hmm.
Okay. What's going on?
[chuckles] Funny, I was gonna ask you the same thing.
translation.zh: ‎真有意思 我本来也要这么问你

translation.en: What are you doing with that?
Oh, this priceless piece of ancient cultural whatnot?
translation.zh: ‎这个价值连城的古老文化的玩意？

translation.en: Booth gave us a fake egg.
I'll admit, Booth was my first thought too.
translation.zh: ‎我承认 我一开始想到的也是布斯

translation.en: Then I asked myself, "How well do you really know someone
translation.zh:
‎然后我问自己
‎“你对72小时前刚认识的人

translation.en: you only met 72 hours ago?"
And someone whose official credentials
came solely by a written interagency communiqué.
translation.zh: ‎只有一份手写的跨部门公报

translation.en: So I called up the Assistant Director of the BAU at Quantico, really nice lady.
translation.zh:
‎于是我给匡提科行为分析小组的
‎副组长打了个电话 她人很好

translation.en: She'd never heard of you.
-That's impossible. -[Das] Is it?
Yes, it's impossible.
As impossible as a John Hartley with a Swiss bank account
translation.zh:
‎同样不可能的是
‎约翰哈特利的瑞士银行账号

translation.en: that received an $8 million wire transfer
from an encrypted third-party on the same day the egg was stolen?
translation.zh:
‎收到了加密第三方
‎800万美元的转账

translation.en: Quite a coincidence, wouldn't you say, Agent?
[officer 2 over radio] We have eyes on target.
Listen, whatever you think this is, whatever you think I did, I didn't do.
translation.zh:
‎听我说 无论你怎么想
‎事情不是你想的那样 我确实没做

translation.en: Someone's behind this. The Bishop, maybe even Booth himself.
translation.zh:
‎有人在背后操控
‎可能是主教 可能是布斯本人

translation.en: -I'm being set up. -Maybe you are, maybe you're not.
translation.zh:
‎-我被陷害了
‎-也许吧 但也许没有

translation.en: Until I figure it out, I'm gonna keep you where I can find you.
translation.zh:
‎在我查清之前
‎我要把你放在能随时找到的地方

translation.en: Now, normally, I'm not a vindictive person, but,
translation.zh: ‎通常我不是个报复心强的人 但是

translation.en: well, I trusted you and you hurt my feelings.
translation.zh: ‎我信任了你 而你却伤害了我的感情

translation.en: So I picked someplace extra special.
translation.zh: ‎所以我挑了个很特别的地方

translation.en: It's a bit of a black site. Kind of the land due process forgot.
translation.zh: ‎算是个黑牢 被法律程序遗忘的地方

translation.en: You're under arrest, Agent Hartley.
Das, look at me. Look at my eyes.
translation.zh: ‎达斯 看着我 看着我的眼睛

translation.en: I didn't do this.
I don't believe you.
You a top or a bottom? [grunts]
Doesn't matter. Prison's gonna decide for us.
translation.zh: ‎不重要 监狱会为我们选择的

translation.en: You gotta be shittin' me.
[Booth] Well, I'll say one thing about ol' Inspector Das,
translation.zh: ‎关于达斯警官 我有句话要说

translation.en: she's got a real sense of humor.
Put 'er there, roomie.
You're right, we should wash up first.
It's okay. You're safe here.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 你在这里很安全

translation.en: Except if they find out you're a cop. Then they're gonna wanna kill you.
translation.zh:
‎除非他们发现你是警察
‎那他们会想杀了你

translation.en: [Booth] Bishop must have seen you coming from a mile away.
translation.zh: ‎主教肯定早知道你会到这一步

translation.en: Got your trust after selling me out.
Can't run a con without gaining the mark's trust first, that's page one.
translation.zh:
‎诈骗首先要获得目标的信任
‎这是基础知识

translation.en: I know how a confidence scheme works, trust me.
translation.zh: ‎我知道信任诈骗的套路 相信我

translation.en: [Booth] Well, you do now, that's for sure.
The same mystery thief who ratted me out is the same one who framed you.
translation.zh:
‎告密出卖我的神秘窃贼
‎和陷害你的是同一个人

translation.en: That seems like a coincidence, don't you think?
This is not a coincidence. This is a plan.
translation.zh: ‎这不是巧合 是计划好的

translation.en: In one move, The Bishop took out her lead competitor and lead investigator.
translation.zh:
‎一次行动中 主教同时干掉了
‎头号竞争者和头号调查员

translation.en: -Two birds, one stone. -Egg.
-What? -Two birds, one egg.
It's kind of a lay-up. Even Post Malone gets it.
translation.zh: ‎这是一种连击手法 连波兹马龙都懂

translation.en: This is farm-to-table, right? Thank you.
I don't understand why.
Why would The Bishop go to the trouble of framing me when she already has the egg?
translation.zh:
‎主教已经拿到了蛋
‎为什么还要费工夫陷害我？

translation.en: I mean, what's left?
Three hundred million dollars?
You're kidding. I never heard of a price tag like that.
translation.zh: ‎你开玩笑吧 我没听过这么高的标价

translation.en: No one has.
But you don't understand, that's not the price for just one egg.
translation.zh: ‎但你不明白 那不是一颗蛋的标价

translation.en: Here's the deal.
Whoever brings this Egyptian billionaire all three eggs
by the night of his daughter's wedding gets all the marbles.
translation.zh:
‎他女儿婚礼之夜时送来三颗蛋
‎就能拿走所有大奖

translation.en: Turns out, Mr. Big Daddy Big Bucks' daughter,
guess what her name is?
Stop guessing, it's Cleopatra.
translation.zh: ‎别猜了 叫克里奥佩特拉

translation.en: I mean, these people are horrible. But I like money, so…
translation.zh: ‎这些人真可怕 但我喜欢钱 所以…

translation.en: So how does that work?
No one knows where the third egg is. It's never been found.
translation.zh:
‎没人知道第三颗蛋在哪儿
‎从没人找到过

translation.en: I'm not gonna lie, that's a bit of a problem.
translation.zh: ‎我说实话 这确实是个问题

translation.en: I was gonna deal with the second egg first.
Then the rest.
[sighs] All right, well, Bureau intel says that the second egg
translation.zh: ‎好吧 调查局情报说第二颗蛋

translation.en: is owned by an international arms dealer.
Sotto Voce. I know all about this guy.
translation.zh: ‎低语者 我很了解这个人

translation.en: His dad tried to strangle him when he was 14.
translation.zh: ‎他14岁时 他父亲试图掐死他

translation.en: Nobody can stand this son of a bitch. [chuckles]
Apparently, it left quite the impression on him.
translation.zh: ‎显然这给他留下了很深的影响

translation.en: And strangling folks became sort of a hobby for him.
translation.zh: ‎掐死别人成了他的一种爱好

translation.en: He's a big fan.
[Booth] Sotto Voce is super scary.
But he's not above having a good time.
Throws a masquerade party every year for his top buyers
translation.zh:
‎每年他都会为顶级买家们
‎办一场化装舞会

translation.en: in his I-probably-have-a-tiny-penis villa in Valencia.
translation.zh:
‎地点位于他在巴伦西亚的别墅
‎那里大到让人怀疑他下面很小

translation.en: Gunrunners are a little touchy about their identity.
translation.zh: ‎走私军火的人对身份有点敏感

translation.en: So the Eyes Wide Shut thing takes the edge off for everyone.
translation.zh:
‎所以搞《大开眼戒》那种化装舞会
‎让大家都能放松一些

translation.en: Now, what none of these evil one-percenters know
translation.zh:
‎然而全球最有钱的
‎那1%的富人们不知道

translation.en: is that upstairs, locked away in a secret vault,
Dr. Shirtless has in his possession
translation.zh: ‎这个不穿上衣的博士锁着一件

translation.en: an ancient piece of pricelessness that I like to call…
translation.zh: ‎古老的无价之宝 我称之为

translation.en: Cleopatra's second egg.
And it's just begging for me to steal it.
I'd be on my way there right now if you weren't such a super cop.
translation.zh:
‎要不是你扮演超级警察
‎我现在早就在去偷它的路上了

translation.en: -Don't do that. -[whispers] What?
-Don't do that. -[whispers] Do what?
-I know what you're doing. Listen. -[whispers] I'm not doing anything.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道你在干什么 听我说
‎-我什么都没干

translation.en: [whispering] These guys here, if they find out you're a C-O-P…
translation.zh: ‎这里的人 如果他们知道你是条子…

translation.en: This is a room full of convicted murderers and toilet vodka enthusiasts.
translation.zh:
‎这里满屋子都是
‎判刑谋杀犯和厕所伏特加爱好者

translation.en: We gotta make sure they know you're not a cop.
translation.zh: ‎我们得保证他们都知道你不是警察

translation.en: -[yelling] Nyet politsiya. -[in English] Listen to me. I beg…
Guys? Nyet politsiya. Not a cop.
This man is not a cop, all right?
Get that through your thick skulls right now!
translation.zh: ‎把这话记在你们的大脑袋里！

translation.en: He's a profiler for the FBI,
which does fall under the umbrella of law enforcement, but not a cop.
translation.zh: ‎确实算是执法人员 但不是警察

translation.en: It's similar, but it's not the same thing. It's a complicated backstory.
translation.zh:
‎很像 但不一样
‎背景知识解释起来很复杂

translation.en: This is our good friend, Special Agent John Hartley.
translation.zh:
‎这是我们的好朋友
‎约翰哈特利特别探员

translation.en: Let's give him a warm welcome to the prison, guys.
translation.zh: ‎让我们热烈欢迎他来到监狱 各位

translation.en: Thank you, guys. [whispering] I don't think anyone heard me. We're good.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢大家 ‎我觉得没人听到我说话 我们没事

translation.en: All's quiet on the western front.
-Nobody's… Oh, no. -[objects clattering]
[Booth] Yep. Drago Grande heard. Here he comes.
translation.zh: ‎是的 德拉戈格兰德听到了 他来了

translation.en: [whispering] Okay, be cool. Don't embarrass me.
[normally] Hello, sir.
Politsiya.
You die.
[whispering] Okay, he knows.
He knows you're a cop.
The jig is up.
[whispering] It's okay.
You can have mine. You need some nourishment.
translation.zh: ‎你可以吃我的 你需要补充营养

translation.en: [whispering] You should get up. You look like a little bitch right now.
translation.zh:
‎你应该站起来
‎你现在看起来有点懦弱

translation.en: I say that as a friend.
Okay, look.
I don't wanna do the whole prison fight thing with you…
-[soft] You got this. I'm in your corner. -So please, no fight.
translation.zh: ‎你可以的 我支持你 ‎拜托 别打架

translation.en: Let's just go back and finish our meals.
-No. No-- -[guard in Russian] Back to your cell!
[Booth in English] God…
All that working out.
You still get your ass spanked by a toothless man with tuberculosis--
translation.zh:
‎还不是被那个
‎没牙的肺结核病人揍翻…

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
If you ever pull shit like that again, it'll be the last thing you do.
translation.zh:
‎你要是再搞这种事情
‎你的日子就到头了

translation.en: Right.
-You don't know me, Booth. -No.
translation.zh:
‎-你不了解我 布斯
‎-不了解

translation.en: You have no idea what I'm capable of.
Okay. Thank God, you're here.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 谢天谢地 你们来了

translation.en: [in Russian] The captain wants to see you. Let's go!
[in English] Him?
Oh, no, us. Okay.
Hello, boys.
Oh, my God.
You're the captain?
You might benefit from a little career change. [chuckles]
I mean, I'm… I don't think runway,
but definitely regional catalog work, fliers…
translation.zh:
‎但绝对可以
‎为地区画报、广告传单拍照…

translation.en: She's The Bishop.
No shit, dipdick!
It's so nice to finally meet you, Mr. Booth.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴终于见到你了 布斯先生

translation.en: Such a thrill to be face-to-face
with the second-best art thief in the world.
Oh, I see what you did there. That's… [chuckles]
Yeah, you got lucky a couple of times early on, you know?
translation.zh: ‎是 之前有几次算你走运 知道吗？

translation.en: But you can't name one time in the past year that you beat me.
translation.zh: ‎但过去一年 你一次也没有打败过我

translation.en: -Helsinki. -My parachute failed.
Jakarta.
-My Segway sank. -Macau.
translation.zh:
‎-我的电动平衡车沉海了
‎-澳门

translation.en: Nobody knew that Miley Cyrus was going to be there.
translation.zh: ‎谁能想到麦莉塞勒斯会去呢？

translation.en: It was a completely unannounced show.
translation.zh: ‎那完全是场毫无预兆的演出

translation.en: You can have excuses or results.
translation.zh: ‎你要么找借口 要么看结果

translation.en: -[whispers] Not both. -[scoffs]
What are we doing here? What do you want?
To have a chat.
First of all, Agent Hartley,
please accept my sincerest apologies for the whole mix-up in Rome.
translation.zh: ‎请接受我对罗马闹剧的诚挚道歉

translation.en: You see, after I stole the egg in Bali,
translation.zh: ‎你看 我在巴厘岛偷了蛋之后

translation.en: I then made an $8 million deposit into an account registered in your name.
translation.zh:
‎就给以你名义注册的账号
‎打了800万美元

translation.en: Then, all I had to do was sit back and wait for Das to take the bait.
A few clever keystrokes and a well-timed call intercept.
translation.zh: ‎敲几下键盘 恰到好处地拦截电话

translation.en: [The Bishop] FBI BAU Director's office.
translation.zh: ‎联邦调查局行为分析小组组长办公室

translation.en: And poof. [gasps]
[mockingly] Bye-bye, Agent John Hartley.
Hello, suspicious suspect.
Funny, don't you think?
Shut up. You deleted my life.
And now I'm stuck in a cell with this idiot.
translation.zh: ‎现在我和这个傻子困在同一间牢房里

translation.en: Well, down to business then.
At the risk of stating the obvious,
I have the first egg in my possession,
and in less than 48 hours, I'm gonna have the second one as well.
translation.zh: ‎48小时内 第二颗也会到手

translation.en: But that leaves an issue. The final egg.
Well, too bad for you. Nobody knows where the third egg is.
translation.zh: ‎太遗憾了 没人知道第三颗蛋在哪儿

translation.en: He didn't tell you?
You didn't tell him?
-Didn't tell me what? -I don't know what she's talking about.
translation.zh:
‎-没告诉我什么？
‎-我不知道她在说什么

translation.en: Your cellmate here knows exactly where the third egg is.
translation.zh: ‎你的狱友知道第三颗蛋的准确位置

translation.en: She's lying. I do not know where the third egg is. I swear to God.
translation.zh:
‎她在说谎 我不知道第三颗蛋在哪儿
‎我对天发誓

translation.en: [Booth] I know where the third egg is. I swear to God.
translation.zh: ‎我知道第三颗蛋在哪儿 我对天发誓

translation.en: Yes, that is me. Scratch that. That was me. I did say that.
translation.zh:
‎对 那是我 重来
‎那是我 我确实说过

translation.en: When were you gonna tell me about the third egg?
translation.zh: ‎你打算何时跟我说第三颗蛋的事？

translation.en: I was never gonna tell you about the third egg because you're a cop.
translation.zh:
‎我没打算跟你说第三颗蛋的事
‎因为你是警察

translation.en: [The Bishop] My offer to you, Mr. Booth, is this.
translation.zh: ‎我给你的条件是这样的 布斯先生

translation.en: Tell me where the third egg is, I'll get you out of here and give you 10%.
translation.zh:
‎告诉我第三颗蛋在哪儿
‎我会把你弄出去 分给你10%

translation.en: Rock-hard pass.
I'm sorry we couldn't do business.
Well, perhaps a few more days in here
with the prospect of thousands more to come
will help change your mind. [chuckles]
I'll stop by once I have the second egg.
translation.zh: ‎等我拿到第二颗蛋会再过来

translation.en: Oh, and when I do, the offer's gonna be 5%.
[in Russian] Thank you, Captain. Labor detail for them both.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 长官 ‎这是他们俩的劳动清单

translation.en: [in English] Bye. Don't miss me too much.
Ta-ta!
Oh, hey, guys. [chuckles] Okay!
[Hartley] If we work together to catch her,
I can do things to The Bishop you can't do.
translation.zh: ‎我可以对主教做一些你做不到的事情

translation.en: [Booth] There's no need to be disgusting.
Here we go. Three, two, one. Lift with your neck.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 三、二、一 用你的脖子发力

translation.en: I mean put her in prison. For life.
translation.zh: ‎我是说让她坐牢 终生监禁

translation.en: When that happens, guess who becomes number one art thief in the world again?
translation.zh:
‎到那时候 猜猜谁会成为
‎世界第一的艺术品窃贼？

translation.en: Teamwork? It feels weird in my mouth.
translation.zh: ‎团队合作？从我嘴里说出来真奇怪

translation.en: Are you carrying your side?
-I'm offended you'd even ask me that. -[grunting]
translation.zh: ‎你问出这种问题真是没礼貌

translation.en: -Do something. It's slipping. -Oh, relax, baldylocks.
translation.zh:
‎-想想办法啊 要滑下来了
‎-别紧张 秃头

translation.en: See? Teamwork.
Team. Team. Team. [chuckling] It feels weird in my mouth.
translation.zh: ‎团队 我说出口太奇怪了

translation.en: It does.
Say what you will about Russian prisons, the soap is incredible.
translation.zh:
‎要说俄罗斯监狱有什么好东西
‎肥皂真是太棒了

translation.en: -Are we doing this together or not? -No added chemicals or perfumes.
translation.zh: ‎我们要不要联手？ ‎没有添加化学品或香料

translation.en: It's just pure good ol' fashioned glycerin.
-Ooh. Smell it. -I'm not gonna smell it.
Sotto Voce's masquerade ball is tomorrow night,
translation.zh: ‎低语者的化装舞会就在明晚

translation.en: which means, if we're gonna beat The Bishop to the second egg,
translation.zh: ‎如果要赶在主教之前拿到第二颗蛋

translation.en: we have to be on the other side of these walls by tomorrow morning.
translation.zh: ‎我们明早就必须逃到墙外去

translation.en: I already know how I'm gonna steal it.
It'll take adjustment now The Bishop'll be there, but I'll beat her to the punch.
translation.zh:
‎因为现在主教也要去 计划需要调整
‎但我会赶在她前面

translation.en: "I"? What about "we"?
Why are you wearing the hairnet? You're bald.
Okay, fine. You can be my plus-one to Sotto Voce's party.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 你可以和我一起
‎去低语者的舞会

translation.en: [Hartley] Thanks. Clock's tickin'. We gotta get outta here. What's the plan?
translation.zh:
‎谢谢 时间不多了 我们得出去
‎你有什么计划？

translation.en: [Booth] I'm working on it.
You're working on it? You sound like you're working on it.
They say the most important part of any plan is a good night's sleep.
translation.zh:
‎他们说任何计划最重要的部分
‎都是晚上好好睡一觉

translation.en: Isn't the actual plan part the most important part of the plan?
translation.zh: ‎计划最重要的部分不是计划本身吗？

translation.en: A lotta people make that mistake.
Back in Bali, that thing you said,
translation.zh: ‎在巴厘岛 你说了一些话

translation.en: about me and my father, how'd you know?
translation.zh: ‎关于我和我父亲 你是怎么知道的？

translation.en: I hate to break it to you, but you're not a complex case.
translation.zh: ‎我实话告诉你 你的案例并不复杂

translation.en: The one thing that doesn't quite line up for me is
translation.zh: ‎但对我来说有一点不太合理

translation.en: how the son of a Swiss police captain turns to a life of high crime.
translation.zh:
‎一个瑞士警察队长的儿子
‎怎么会走上重罪犯的人生

translation.en: Short version?
My father was a prolific asshole.
Long version?
When I was eight years old,
my dad thought I stole his watch.
He loved that piece of metal more than anything.
He asked me if I stole it. I told him I didn't.
He said he knew that I had and that I was lying.
translation.zh: ‎他说他知道是我偷的 说我撒谎

translation.en: He didn't speak to me again after that.
Not on Christmas. Not on my birthday.
He went almost a full year, just utter silence.
translation.zh: ‎他几乎持续了一整年 ‎完全沉默不语

translation.en: Like I didn't even exist.
Then one night, he…
He comes home and he sits down at the dinner table…
And there it is.
There's the watch, the missing watch,
right there on his wrist.
Found out later that he put it in his desk at work
translation.zh: ‎我后来知道 是他上班时放在抽屉里

translation.en: and it got buried behind some papers or something like that.
But he never apologized. He just, uh…
He just looked me in the eye and said, "How was your day at school?"
translation.zh:
‎他看着我的眼睛说
‎“今天在学校如何？”

translation.en: Then he kept askin', "How was your day at school?"
translation.zh:
‎后来他一直问
‎“今天在学校如何？”

translation.en: And I never answered him.
I just stared at him. I didn't eat. I didn't drink.
translation.zh: ‎我就盯着他 我不吃不喝

translation.en: Next week, I found myself in boarding school.
translation.zh: ‎第二周 我就被送去了寄宿学校

translation.en: Really?
[inhales] I'm kidding.
Hey.
I'm sorry about all that.
Oh, no, no, no, no, it's all right. [sniffs]
You learn a valuable lesson, you know?
It doesn't matter what you do,
only matters what they think you've done.
translation.zh: ‎人们觉得你做了什么才重要

translation.en: How about your old man?
I don't talk about him.
That bad, huh?
[Booth] Good news.
I slept like a baby after our little therapy session last night.
translation.zh: ‎昨晚的治愈疗程之后 我睡得特别好

translation.en: Better news,
I've got our escape plan down to a simple three-step process.
translation.zh: ‎我把逃脱计划简化到了三步

translation.en: All right, I'll bite. What's the first step?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我信你 第一步是什么？

translation.en: -[whistles] Create a distraction. -With soap?
You know what happens when you mix soap, which is pure glycerin,
with a cleaning solution that's essentially nitric acid?
translation.zh:
‎混合主要成分是硝酸的清洁剂
‎会发生什么吗？

translation.en: -You get nitroglycerin. -You get nitroglycerin.
translation.zh:
‎-会得到硝酸甘油
‎-会得到硝酸甘油

translation.en: We should run.
Go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go.
[in English] It's locked. We need a key card.
Step two, plan ahead.
-Where'd you get that? -Nyet politsiya.
He's not a cop!
What's the plan-- Son of a bitch!
-[in Russian] What? Understood. -[indistinct chatter on phone]
[in English] What are you doing? What's step three?
[Booth] Step three…
Rock Jenga.
You first.
-Thanks. -You're welcome.
[in Russian] Get back!
This way.
They're outside the walls. Secure the perimeter.
Okay. Okay.
Can you fly a helicopter?
Does the back of your head look like a huge penis?
translation.zh: ‎你后脑勺长得像个巨大的阴茎吗？

translation.en: The answer is yes!
Oh, that's fun. This is my best friend.
translation.zh: ‎好有趣 这是我最好的朋友

translation.en: -We're not friends. -We're best friends.
translation.zh:
‎-我们不是朋友
‎-我们是最好的朋友

translation.en: -[in Russian] They're over here! -[in English] Go!
I can't believe nobody saw that.
[in Russian] Here they are! Fire!
[Booth in English] Okay.
That's in Russian.
[in Russian] Go, he just has a pistol!
[guard] The forklift!
[in English] Son of a bitch.
[in Russian] Reload!
[in English] Shit.
Oh, you made it. Thank God!
I was praying for you.
Don't give me that shit. You were gonna leave me?
translation.zh: ‎别胡扯了 你刚才想丢下我？

translation.en: You said, "Save yourself."
I said, "Go," but I didn't mean without me.
translation.zh:
‎我说的是“快走”
‎但我没让你丢下我

translation.en: You said, "Go save yourself."
And I was gonna carry you with me in my heart like an eternal flame,
translation.zh: ‎我本来会永远在心中铭记你的光辉

translation.en: you stupid complainer.
[Booth] Why is that blinking?
[Booth] Ooh! Incoming!
See? Easy-peasy.
[The Bishop] I know it sounds like a tough childhood,
translation.zh:
‎（伦敦） ‎我知道我的童年听起来很苦
‎但我父亲成就了今天的我

translation.en: but my father made me who I am today.
translation.zh:
‎我知道我的童年听起来很苦
‎但我父亲成就了今天的我

translation.en: Maybe that's my problem.
I'm so focused on winning all the time, on being the best at what I do,
translation.zh:
‎我一直专注在赢这件事上
‎专注于做到最好

translation.en: that I can never just fully relax and just be.
Is that normal?
[muffled] How the fuck would I know?
[The Bishop] What?
I'm not a therapist. I'm an intelligence analyst.
translation.zh: ‎我不是心理治疗师 我是情报分析师

translation.en: I'm sorry.
[sighs] I'm just dealing with a lot right now
and you seemed like someone I could talk to.
translation.zh: ‎你看起来像个可以倾诉的人

translation.en: And it's so rare in my line of work
to find someone who's just there to listen.
Thank you.
Anyway, I'm sorry to rope you into all of this,
but just using your terminal here
to ensure that the origin point of my message is untraceable.
translation.zh: ‎确保我的消息无法追踪起点

translation.en: Best way to do it is from within the system itself.
translation.zh: ‎最好的方法就是从系统内部发送

translation.en: They should really work on patching the security vulnerability.
translation.zh: ‎他们真该修补一下安全漏洞

translation.en: It's embarrassing.
Did you know that 99% of all tracking protocols
focus on third-party movements? [scoffs]
translation.zh: ‎都把注意力集中到第三方行为吗？

translation.en: No one ever expects the call to come from inside the house, as it were.
translation.zh: ‎还真没人想到电话是从内部打出来的

translation.en: Hence, your computer, your office.
translation.zh: ‎所以你的电脑 你的办公室

translation.en: Oh. Here we go.
Just need to slow down my competition, such as they are.
translation.zh:
‎拖慢一下竞争对手的速度
‎勉强算他们是吧

translation.en: I'm afraid that's all the time we have for today.
I'm gonna have to end our session here. Have a lovely day.
translation.zh: ‎我们的疗程到此结束 祝你愉快

translation.en: Freeze!
[sighs] See?
This is why we can't have nice things.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们才不能拥有美好的回忆

translation.en: 'Cause the moment I trust someone, they tap the foot alarm beneath their desk
translation.zh:
‎因为我一旦相信某个人
‎他们就会踩桌下的脚底报警器

translation.en: and then I'm forced to do things like this.
I'm not angry. I'm just disappointed.
I really thought you were different.
Well, fool me once…
I'm gonna leave now and when he wakes up,
translation.zh: ‎我现在要走了 等他醒来

translation.en: you're going to tell him that you triggered the alarm falsely
translation.zh: ‎告诉他你不小心踩错警报了

translation.en: and in his haste, he tripped coming through the door.
And if you decide not to do that,
I want you to remember one critically important thing.
translation.zh: ‎我希望你记住一件非常重要的事

translation.en: I know everyone you work with and every member of your family.
And I also know your browser history.
Nolan.
Tambwe! Come on, bring it in.
I can't thank you enough for this.
I'm just glad I could finally repay my debt to you.
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴终于还上欠你的债了

translation.en: And now I'm in yours.
-Come, everything is ready. -Alright.
-I have juice boxes. -That's very good.
Hey. Tambwe got us a costume change, so we can get out of these filthy duds.
translation.zh:
‎坦布韦给我们准备了衣服
‎我们可以脱掉脏衣服了

translation.en: Oh. I'm so sorry.
Tambwe, this is Agent John Hartley
translation.zh: ‎坦布韦 这位是约翰哈特利探员

translation.en: of the Federal Bureau of Investigation. It's a funny story.
translation.zh: ‎来自联邦调查局 说来很有趣

translation.en: A lot of his colleagues have put a lot of your colleagues in prison.
translation.zh:
‎他的很多同事
‎把你的很多同事送进了监狱

translation.en: It's exciting.
No juice boxes for you.
Oh, I see.
Nice jacket, while I "Gotta dance."
translation.zh:
‎你穿那么好的外套
‎而我只有“跳舞衣”

translation.en: All right, man. Don't even start with me, okay?
translation.zh:
‎好了 伙计
‎别开始跟我抱怨 好吗？

translation.en: At least you're comfortable.
Well, clearly you have this whole thing figured out.
-You wanna walk me through it? -I do. Here's the deal.
translation.zh:
‎-要跟我讲一遍吗？
‎-没错 是这样的

translation.en: During the party,
the guests and the staff are required to stay on the main floor,
translation.zh: ‎客人们和工作人员必须待在主楼层

translation.en: and upstairs, the door to the egg room,
well, that's locked and heavily guarded.
But there's another way in. Hidden entrance.
translation.zh: ‎但有另一个进去的方法 隐藏入口

translation.en: Here's what I'm thinkin'.
We dress up in matching black pajamas
and sneak past the featured extras and into the bedroom.
translation.zh: ‎偷偷穿过群演 进入卧室

translation.en: Then, we slip through the study and get our hands on his precious.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们通过书房 拿到他的宝物

translation.en: -Is that the egg? -[shushes]
I'm sorry.
-You are amazing. -I know.
-Hey, dickhead. -Hmm?
Your last brilliant plan had some kinks in it.
translation.zh: ‎你上一个机智的计划不太顺利

translation.en: So, what kinda security surveillance are we looking at?
translation.zh: ‎我们面对的是什么样的安保监控？

translation.en: Well, the guy's an arms dealer,
so, you know, every square inch of this place is gonna be on lock.
translation.zh: ‎所以每寸地盘都在监视之下

translation.en: Two-man guard teams at every access point are signal rotated to keep them frosty.
translation.zh:
‎每个连通点都有二人组守卫
‎按信号进行交班 以保持随时警戒

translation.en: Once they're on the move, you only have 45 seconds until they land.
translation.zh:
‎交班一旦开始
‎他们就位前只有45秒的间隙

translation.en: It's a pretty tight window.
The eyes and ears are in a secure room in the west hall.
translation.zh: ‎西侧大厅下方的安保室有声画监控器

translation.en: Eighty-seven motion-sensitive 8K cameras with an overlapping field of vision,
translation.zh:
‎87台动作感应8K摄像头
‎监视范围相互重叠

translation.en: so there are no natural blind spots.
They're always watching, always listening.
translation.zh: ‎它们时刻都在监视、监听这一切

translation.en: Kinda like Alexa but with guns.
Now, here's where things get a little tricky.
The vault door to the egg room is a military-grade,
translation.zh: ‎通往蛋房的保险库门属于军用等级

translation.en: biometric portal made out of a foot and a half of solid titanium.
translation.zh:
‎生物识别终端
‎由46厘米厚的钛金属制成

translation.en: So you can't drill it and you can't make it go boom.
The only way through it is with facial and voice recognition.
translation.zh:
‎唯一的通过方法
‎就是进行面部和语音识别

translation.en: And there's only one face and one voice that opens it.
translation.zh: ‎只有一张面孔和一个声音能打开它

translation.en: Sotto Voce.
How are we gonna get his voice and his facial?
translation.zh: ‎我们要怎么弄到他的声音和面容？

translation.en: Well, first off, a positive mental attitude helps.
translation.zh: ‎首先 积极的心态是有用的

translation.en: But so does some pretty kick-ass deepfake technology.
translation.zh: ‎但也需要一些超高端的换脸视频技术

translation.en: Spooky, right?
If you have more than 12 images on the Internet,
translation.zh: ‎如果你在网上有超过12张照片

translation.en: I can send your mom a video of you mouth-sexing a goat.
translation.zh:
‎我就能给你妈发一段
‎你给山羊口交的视频

translation.en: I'm not saying I'm gonna do that, I'm just saying I could if I wanted to.
translation.zh:
‎我不是说我会这么做 我只是说
‎如果我想 我可以做到

translation.en: If I had enough time and enough pictures.
translation.zh: ‎如果我有足够多的时间和照片的话

translation.en: But wait, there's more.
There's also a 12-digit randomly-generated passcode that's changed every six minutes,
translation.zh:
‎还有一个12位随机生成的密码
‎每六分钟变更一次

translation.en: and that code can only be found in Sotto Voce's phone,
translation.zh: ‎密码只出现在低语者的手机上

translation.en: and Sotto Voce's phone can only be found in Sotto Voce's pants.
translation.zh:
‎低语者的手机
‎只会放在低语者的裤兜里

translation.en: So, yeah, easy-peasy.
Oh, no, no, no! There's one more thing. Kinda important.
translation.zh: ‎不！还有一件事 有点重要

translation.en: We're gonna need his thumbprint 'cause he never upgraded his iPhone -4, so…
translation.zh:
‎我们需要他的指纹 ‎因为他从不更新
‎他的iPhone4 所以…

translation.en: So if we don't get his thumbprint, we can't get the egg.
translation.zh:
‎如果拿不到他的指纹
‎我们就拿不到蛋

translation.en: Oh, my God.
You can learn. This is amazing.
translation.zh: ‎你会举一反三了 太棒了

translation.en: You are not sparkly enough.
I'm gonna get you a matching vest to go with those pants.
translation.zh: ‎我去给你找一件能搭这条裤子的背心

translation.en: [Booth] Check, check. Roger Dodger. What's your 20, free bird?
translation.zh: ‎测试 收到 你的位置 自由鸟？

translation.en: You don't have to do that. I'm standing right next to you.
translation.zh: ‎你不必这样 我就站在你旁边

translation.en: I'm not used to using these stupid things,
and I'm not used to working with a partner.
We're not partners. This is a marriage of convenience.
translation.zh: ‎我们不是搭档 这是权宜婚姻

translation.en: I want a divorce and I'm keeping the kids.
Let's just do this.
I'll get the thumbprint, you get Sotto Voce's phone.
translation.zh: ‎我去搞指纹 你去搞低语者的手机

translation.en: We've got a party crasher.
Yeah, it's no biggie. No biggie. We knew she'd be here.
translation.zh: ‎没什么大不了的 我们知道她会来

translation.en: We're here for the egg, not her.
translation.zh: ‎我们是来找蛋的 不是来找她

translation.en: Speak for yourself. I'm going in.
translation.zh: ‎那只是你的想法 我要进去了

translation.en: What are you doing? That's not part of the plan.
translation.zh: ‎你在干什么？这跟计划好的不一样

translation.en: Plans change.
Beautiful.
The sculpture, I mean.
I'm sorry, do we know each other?
It's just impossible for me to tell who you are with that mask on.
translation.zh: ‎你戴着面具 我看不出你是谁

translation.en: -How about now? -[gasps theatrically]
Agent Hartley!
So it was you all along.
Such a clever disguise.
Well, I suppose you and Mr. Booth, wherever he is,
translation.zh: ‎无论他在哪 我猜你和布斯先生

translation.en: are here to try to beat me to the second egg.
translation.zh: ‎是想先我一步拿走第二颗蛋

translation.en: -Even the playing field. -Don't tell her anything.
I'm not here for the egg. I'm here to clear my name,
translation.zh:
‎我不是来找蛋的
‎我是来洗刷我的污名

translation.en: which means all I need is you.
You're literally telling her everything.
We both know that this whole thing is gonna end with you in handcuffs.
translation.zh:
‎我们都知道这一切最后的结局
‎就是你被戴上手铐

translation.en: Promises, promises.
Careful now. We don't wanna cause a scene.
translation.zh: ‎小心点 我们不想引人注目

translation.en: Don't care. I'm not letting you out of my sight.
translation.zh: ‎我不在乎 我不会让你脱离我的视线

translation.en: Oh, good, you're dancing with her.
Not bad for a convict.
translation.zh: ‎对一个罪犯来说 跳得不错

translation.en: Speaking of which, how's it going with your partner in crime?
translation.zh: ‎说到这个  ‎你的犯罪搭档怎样了？

translation.en: Has he told you where the third egg is yet?
translation.zh: ‎他告诉你第三颗蛋在哪儿了吗？

translation.en: Well, if he did, I wouldn't tell you.
translation.zh: ‎就算他说了 我也不会告诉你

translation.en: That's a no. He must not trust you.
translation.zh: ‎那就是没有 他肯定不相信你

translation.en: You trust your partner?
[The Bishop] What makes you think I have one?
Well, no one would be able to pull off the scores you have alone.
translation.zh: ‎你的战绩可不是能独自完成的

translation.en: It's impossible.
So what now?
You're gonna arrest me right here,
without a badge or a gun, outside of your jurisdiction,
translation.zh: ‎没有警徽 没有枪 在管辖范围外

translation.en: and in front of a room full of criminals?
Is that your plan, Agent Hartley?
translation.zh: ‎这就是你的计划吗 哈特利探员？

translation.en: Shit!
[Booth] Incoming! Got the print. Get the hell out of there.
Or perhaps you just didn't think this all the way through.
You're coming with me. Party's over.
Watching you dance with this man at my party has made me quite jealous.
translation.zh:
‎看你和这个男人在我的舞会上跳舞
‎让我很嫉妒

translation.en: Well, I had to get your attention somehow.
translation.zh: ‎我总得想办法引起你的注意

translation.en: Didn't I?
May I?
Like you said, it's your party.
translation.zh: ‎如你所说 这是你的舞会

translation.en: Apologies.
We needed to get his phone,
not waste time playing footsie with The Bishop.
Don't worry. I got it.
Excuse me.
You're kidding. Nice pull!
How'd you know Sotto Voce would cut in?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么知道低语者会打断你们？

translation.en: Well, Sotto Voce is a 5'5" alpha male with textbook Napoleon complex.
translation.zh:
‎低语者是个1米65的大男子主义者
‎有教科书般的拿破仑情结

translation.en: So any time another male dances with the most desirable woman at his party,
translation.zh:
‎任何时候有别的男人
‎和他舞会上最让人着迷的女人跳舞

translation.en: well, he has no choice but to step in and assert his dominance.
translation.zh: ‎他都必然会介入 宣誓主权

translation.en: You sneaky little minx.
Where'd you learn that? Profiler school?
High school.
Ladies and gentlemen,
it is my sincere pleasure to welcome you all to my humble home.
translation.zh: ‎非常荣幸恭迎各位来到寒舍

translation.en: -[crowd chuckle] -Now's the time. He's speechifying.
[Sotto Voce] My father was a man of conviction…
[Booth] Moving to two.
Oh! Terribly, terribly sorry, sir.
You imbecile!
-Oh… -Don't put your hands on me, peasant.
[in Spanish] I'm so sorry, sir. [in English] A thousand apologies.
translation.zh: ‎我很抱歉 先生 ‎我深表抱歉

translation.en: I don't need your apologies, I need a washroom.
translation.zh: ‎我不需要道歉 我需要去盥洗室

translation.en: Take him.
Right this way, sir.
[whispers] Let's get you hosed down.
[Sotto Voce] This pistol was my father's prized possession.
I've kept it close to my heart since the day I killed him with it.
translation.zh:
‎自从用它杀了他之后
‎我一直把它贴在心脏旁存放

translation.en: I was never permitted to touch this as a boy.
translation.zh: ‎我小时候从不被允许触碰它

translation.en: [Booth] Right this way.
[Sotto Voce] It's just like the one used by the Lone Ranger.
[in Spanish] Hey.
What's going on there?
Someone spilled wine on a guest. They're cleared.
translation.zh:
‎那人把酒撒在了客人身上
‎他们没问题

translation.en: Something's off. I'm calling it in anyway.
Don't be an idiot. You read too many spy novels. [scoffs]
translation.zh: ‎别傻了 你间谍小说看多了

translation.en: [Sotto Voce in English] I miss you every day, Pop-Pop.
And in his immortal words,
translation.zh: ‎就像他那句不朽的名言所说

translation.en: "The skilled hunter needs but one bullet."
translation.zh: ‎“经验丰富的猎人只需要一颗子弹”

translation.en: -[guest] Bravo! -Enjoy your evening.
No, no, no, no, no.
We gotta go.
[Booth] Here we go, nice and easy.
Oh, my God!
You're like a well-dressed wall.
What are you doing?
Trying to ruin the mission.
Well, mission accomplished. Find the print.
God damn it!
Come on, come on, come on, you little bastard. Where are you?
translation.zh: ‎出来 小混蛋 你在哪？

translation.en: Shit!
Gotcha.
Phone, phone, phone, phone.
Okay, it's deepfake time.
Sotto Voce.
Right.
[in Spanish] I thought Mr. Voce was still at the party?
translation.zh: ‎低语者先生不是还在舞会吗？

translation.en: Send a team.
Security, we have a code red.
[Das in English] Hey!
You know, for a guy who claims he's innocent,
you sure do hang around with a lot of criminals.
I am innocent.
He's a pretty damn good thief for his first time.
translation.zh: ‎作为第一次上手的贼 他很厉害

translation.en: -I'm not good at it. -[Booth] You are.
-Don't say that. -Don't sell yourself short.
-Shut up. -Hector Deflector over here.
translation.zh:
‎-闭嘴
‎-嘿 这位转移话题的先生

translation.en: He's not good at taking a compliment.
translation.zh:
‎-闭嘴
‎-嘿 这位转移话题的先生 ‎他不擅长接受表扬

translation.en: I need you to understand, The Bishop is behind this entire thing.
translation.zh:
‎你要明白
‎是主教在背后设计了这一切

translation.en: She set me up.
Well, if this is all The Bishop's doing and you really are innocent, prove it.
translation.zh:
‎如果这一切都是主教干的
‎你真的是清白的 那证明给我看

translation.en: Go on, detain your friend.
We're not friends.
-We're work wives. -We're not work wives.
translation.zh:
‎-我们是职场伴侣
‎-我们不是职场伴侣

translation.en: -We're sister wives. -We're not any kind of wives.
translation.zh:
‎-我们是妻室伴侣
‎-我们不是任何伴侣

translation.en: Shut up! Both of you.
You either arrest him or I arrest you both.
translation.zh: ‎逮捕他 不然我把你们都抓了

translation.en: What's it gonna be, Agent Hartley?
-I'm sorry, man. -Oh…
Oh, come on!
-You're under arrest. -You're gonna listen?
After all we've been through together…
[whispers] You love me?
[whispers] I hate you.
-[in normal voice] Tight enough? Jesus! -[sighs] See?
I'm a good guy.
But sometimes I do bad things.
-Hartley! -Let's grab that egg and get out of here.
You don't wanna talk about what just happened?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你不想聊一下刚才的事吗？

translation.en: -What you talking about? -We had a moment.
translation.zh:
‎-你说什么呢？
‎-我们刚刚有火花

translation.en: -We didn't have a moment. -No, we had a moment.
Looking for something specific or just browsing?
translation.zh: ‎有要找的东西吗 还是随便看看？

translation.en: You look awful.
Hmm. You know, there was an easier way in,
translation.zh: ‎有更简单的方法可以进来的

translation.en: but I doubt very much that you could've managed it.
translation.zh: ‎但我非常怀疑你们能不能办到

translation.en: Now that I have two out of the three eggs,
translation.zh: ‎现在三颗蛋我已经拿到了两颗

translation.en: I'll give you one last chance to take me up on my offer.
translation.zh: ‎我给你们最后一次机会接受我的条件

translation.en: -Well, here's my counteroffer. -[The Bishop] Mm-hmm.
-You're under arrest. -Oh, my God.
Read the room.
I told you, this would end with you in handcuffs.
translation.zh: ‎我跟你说过 最后你会戴上手铐

translation.en: You're so embarrassing. He's so embarrassing.
translation.zh: ‎你太丢人了 他太丢人了

translation.en: Tell you what, Agent Hartley.
You wanna arrest me?
Come…
Arrest me.
I just want the egg. So, uh--
translation.zh: ‎我只想要蛋 抱歉 真尴尬

translation.en: Take it easy.
This is easy.
Excuse me.
Bro, I didn't… I didn't see the handcuffs coming.
translation.zh: ‎老兄 我没…我没想到会被铐上

translation.en: Mm, was a nice touch.
God, this is such a confusing erection.
You can't ever tell anybody about this.
-[Booth] I'll never tell anybody. Promise. -[Hartley] Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-我不会告诉任何人 我保证
‎-好的

translation.en: [Booth] Okay.
Oh, whoa, hold on, hold on. No, don't shoot.
I'm not trying to be a tattletale. We didn't steal your egg, okay?
translation.zh:
‎我并不想说人闲话
‎不过我们没偷你的蛋 好吗？

translation.en: I mean, we tried.
But she got it.
[Hartley] He's telling you the truth.
Is that so?
Thank you. Oh. All right.
Would you like to make a confession, my lady?
It's a pleasure doing business with you.
I told you they'd come.
What the f--
Good morning, gentlemen.
Down here, beneath the bulls, no one will hear your screams.
translation.zh:
‎这里在斗牛场之下
‎没人听得到你们的尖叫

translation.en: [exhales] That's called foreshadowing.
-I know what it's called. -Was making sure.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道这叫什么
‎-就确认一下

translation.en: You don't look like an English major.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道这叫什么
‎-你看起来不像英语专业的

translation.en: -Shut up. -Buongiorno, everybody!
-Perfect! -[sing-song] I brought champagne.
I would introduce you, but I believe you've already met
translation.zh:
‎我要介绍你们认识
‎不过我相信你们已经见过了

translation.en: my lovely business associate.
[Booth] Yes.
I told you The Bishop was working with somebody.
translation.zh: ‎我跟你说了 主教在和什么人合作

translation.en: It's a marriage of convenience.
You're familiar with that concept, aren't you?
You see, the dashing Mr. Voce here
already held the second egg in his possession.
So, I approached him with my own offer,
which brings us to the part
where you tell us where the third egg is.
translation.zh: ‎你来告诉我们第三颗蛋在哪儿

translation.en: Piss off for a thousand years.
Oh, bummer. I really wanted to do it the easy way.
translation.zh: ‎可惜 我本来真的很想用简单的方式

translation.en: That's okay. I'll get the information from you by hurting him.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 我会通过伤害他来让你开口

translation.en: I'm sorry, what?
I love this plan.
[The Bishop] You two share a special bond.
Otherwise, why would you risk your lives together
translation.zh: ‎不然你们为何愿意一起出生入死

translation.en: attempting to steal the egg?
Isn't that right, Agent Hartley?
There is no bond between us. I barely know the guy.
translation.zh: ‎我们两个没有羁绊 我都不认识他

translation.en: Booth, tell her we're not friends.
translation.zh: ‎布斯 告诉她我们不是朋友

translation.en: -She knows about us, pal. -That's bullshit.
translation.zh:
‎-她知道我们的事 伙计
‎-胡说

translation.en: She knows about our special bond, that you were my best man.
translation.zh:
‎她知道我们特殊的羁绊
‎你曾是我的伴郎

translation.en: Son of a bitch. He's lying.
If she hurts you bad enough, if she gets really creative with it,
translation.zh:
‎如果她把你伤得够狠
‎有别出心裁的酷刑

translation.en: I'm gonna have no choice but to tell her everything.
Now, Mr. Booth, where is the third egg?
translation.zh: ‎好了 布斯先生  ‎第三颗蛋在哪儿？

translation.en: Okay, here I go.
[lazily] No, don't. Wait.
Oh, my God!
Well…
[Hartley] No.
I guess now we find out what kind of friend you really are, Mr. Booth,
translation.zh:
‎看来我们现在知道
‎你是哪种朋友了 布斯先生

translation.en: because we're gonna go to my favorite place.
translation.zh: ‎因为我们要来到我最爱的位置了

translation.en: No.
No. Don't--
Enough games, my love.
If you want to make him talk, this is how you get him to talk.
translation.zh: ‎要想让他开口 就要这样做

translation.en: Why is your shirt off?
-Why is his shirt off? -I don't know.
Sometimes the old ways are the best. Excuse me, darling.
translation.zh: ‎有时候老方法最管用 抱歉 亲爱的

translation.en: There, there, Special Agent Hartley.
Look! Look at your friend.
-The egg. Now! -[labored breathing]
Booth, please.
Okay, stop, stop. I'll tell you, all right?
translation.zh: ‎好了 住手 我告诉你 好吗？

translation.en: -It's in Egypt. -[The Bishop] Where in Egypt?
[Booth] There's a hidden chamber in the Great Pyramid.
Lidar discovered it a year ago. They haven't opened it yet.
translation.zh:
‎一年前通过激光雷达发现的
‎还没有打开

translation.en: -How do you know the egg is there? -My mother was an Egyptologist.
translation.zh: ‎你怎么知道蛋在里面？ ‎我母亲是埃及考古学家

translation.en: I could read hieroglyphics before I could read English.
translation.zh:
‎在看懂英文前
‎我就能看懂象形文字了

translation.en: That hidden chamber
is the secret tomb of Cleopatra.
translation.zh: ‎是克里奥佩特拉的秘密墓穴

translation.en: They buried the third egg there when the other two went missing.
translation.zh:
‎另两颗蛋丢失后
‎他们把第三颗蛋埋在那里

translation.en: The scans show it sitting there plain as day.
translation.zh: ‎扫描显示 蛋就那样放在那里

translation.en: The third egg never left Egypt.
He's not lying. I read about the chamber.
translation.zh: ‎他没撒谎 我读到过那个密室的情况

translation.en: Was that so hard?
-Shall we celebrate? -[Sotto Voce chuckles]
To the end of our business.
And the beginning of our pleasure.
-I mean… -Oh, come on.
You didn't see that coming, amateur hour?
translation.zh: ‎这都想不到吗 太业余了吧？

translation.en: Guard!
I don't know what happened. We were just having a glass of champagne
translation.zh:
‎我不知道怎么回事
‎我们刚才在喝香槟

translation.en: -when all of the sudden he fell. -[guard grunts]
And scene.
Long con?
Long con.
You know, lady, I'm really starting to not like you.
translation.zh: ‎女士 我真的开始不喜欢你了

translation.en: Now I'd really love to stay and see how this whole thing turns out,
translation.zh: ‎我真的很想留下看看后续会如何

translation.en: but I'm late for a date with a very large pyramid.
translation.zh: ‎但我和大金字塔的约会就要迟到了

translation.en: Can't wait to see what happens next.
translation.zh: ‎等不及想看接下来的发展了

translation.en: So exciting!
She's a good singer.
You should have took that deal when she offered it to you in prison.
translation.zh:
‎她在监狱和你谈条件时
‎你就该答应她

translation.en: Well, you shouldn't have got us caught by her boyfriend.
translation.zh: ‎你不该害我们被她男朋友抓到

translation.en: Oh, how did I get us caught by her boyfriend?
Well, if you don't know that, then you really are dumber than I look.
translation.zh:
‎如果你不知道
‎那你真的比我看起来还蠢

translation.en: Jesus! That's really scary.
[Booth, distorted] Oh, you look busted. You look like a zombie.
translation.zh: ‎你看起来都崩坏了 跟僵尸似的

translation.en: You did this.
This is your fault. She was mine.
translation.zh: ‎是你的错 她本该属于我

translation.en: [Booth] Honey, honey, honey, homegirl is a hard ten.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 这姑娘是个满分美女

translation.en: And you look like…
Like a muscular toddler.
I don't think it was gonna work.
-The height difference and… -Oh, shit.
-[gun cocks] -[Booth] Whoa, whoa. Hold on. Let's talk about this. [screaming]
-John, you hit? -[Hartley] No, surprisingly not.
translation.zh:
‎-约翰 你中弹了吗？
‎-没有 居然没有

translation.en: [Booth] What? How is that possible?
[sputtering] How did you get free?
-He shot the cuff. -He hit something?
translation.zh:
‎-他射中了手铐
‎-他竟然打中东西了？

translation.en: Lucky shot.
We're gonna get out of here.
We're really gonna do it.
Oh, hey, whoa, whoa, whoa. Hey, where are you goin'? We're partners.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你去哪儿？我们是搭档

translation.en: Oh, we're partners now? No, our partnership ended
translation.zh:
‎我们现在成搭档了？不
‎我们的搭档关系

translation.en: when you let The Bishop go all shock therapy on me.
translation.zh: ‎在你让主教电击我的时候就终结了

translation.en: You're not gonna find The Bishop. Not without me.
I got a pretty good idea where she's going because of you.
translation.zh: ‎多亏了你 我很清楚她会去哪儿

translation.en: -So, goodbye. -I lied.
-I lied. -What do you mean, "you lied"?
translation.zh:
‎-我撒谎了
‎-“你撒谎了”是啥意思？

translation.en: I lied about everything. All of it. That whole thing.
I lied to you, I lied to her, I lied to Baby Jesus.
translation.zh: ‎我对你、对她、对耶稣宝宝都撒了谎

translation.en: All of 'em.
Look, the point is, is that the third egg isn't in Egypt.
translation.zh: ‎关键在于 第三颗蛋不在埃及

translation.en: Right. I don't give a shit about the egg.
I care about arresting The Bishop and clearing my name.
translation.zh: ‎我只想逮捕主教 还我清白

translation.en: Right. But you won't get to The Bishop unless you get to the egg.
translation.zh: ‎没错 但你找不到蛋就找不到主教

translation.en: And I know where the egg is.
Just get me out of here.
I'll get the egg and you'll get The Bishop.
Come on!
[softly] Pretty please?
Thoughts?
You hear that?
Hey, hey, hey.
Up here.
We'll disappear into the crowd. We'll be home free.
translation.zh: ‎我们会消失在人群中 恢复自由

translation.en: Oh, shit!
I think we're gonna get out of here.
[exclaims] Shit!
-No, no. Don't move. Don't move. -Why?
Bulls have terrible eyesight. But they can sense motion.
translation.zh: ‎公牛视力很差 但他们能感觉到动作

translation.en: You're thinking of Jurassic Park.
No! I saw a nature documentary starring David Attenborough.
translation.zh:
‎不！我看了一部
‎大卫艾登堡主演的自然纪录片

translation.en: You're thinking of Richard Attenborough from Jurassic Park.
translation.zh:
‎你想的是
‎《侏罗纪公园》里的理查德艾登堡

translation.en: Vámonos. Vámonos. They're telling me to run.
If you run, you die.
All right, yes or no, was Jeff Goldblum in it?
translation.zh:
‎回答我
‎片子里有杰夫戈德布拉姆吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God! It was Jurassic Park. That's Jeff Goldblum.
translation.zh:
‎哦 我的天！真的是《侏罗纪公园》
‎那是杰夫戈德布拉姆

translation.en: Asshole!
[Booth] Run, run, run, run, run or you will die!
Thank you!
What's your problem?
Don't run?
Don't run?
[Booth] You gonna be this grumpy the whole trip?
translation.zh: ‎你打算一路上都这样发牢骚吗？

translation.en: Wait till you see our ride. You're gonna love it.
translation.zh:
‎等你看到我们的座驾再决定吧
‎你会喜欢的

translation.en: This is fun, isn't it?
Riding the rails hobo-style.
You ever see, um, uh, Sullivan's Travels?
No, I haven't.
And no, it's not, all right? Cough it up.
Where are we headed? Where's the third egg?
translation.zh: ‎我们要去哪儿？第三颗蛋在哪儿？

translation.en: All right, fine.
I've been thinking about this a lot, and I can't tell you.
translation.zh: ‎我想了很多 但我不能告诉你

translation.en: What do you mean, you can't tell me?
It's not so much of a "can't," it's more of a "won't."
translation.zh: ‎其实不是“不能” 而是“不会”

translation.en: Take me to the third egg, Booth.
translation.zh: ‎带我去找第三颗蛋 布斯

translation.en: You wanna do it?
Do it.
You can't, can you?
'Cause even though you're running around with me, playing the thief,
translation.zh:
‎因为尽管你跟着我
‎东奔西跑 扮演窃贼

translation.en: you're not a real bad guy, Bubba.
translation.zh: ‎你也不是真正的坏人 兄弟

translation.en: Let's get something straight right now.
That was terrifying.
Look, it's not that I don't care about you.
It's that I don't care about anyone.
My dad was a crook.
A con man, actually.
He was the best.
Then on my 13th birthday, he didn't show up.
translation.zh: ‎我13岁生日那天 他没出现

translation.en: My mom and I never saw him again.
translation.zh: ‎从那以后 我和我妈再也没见过他

translation.en: We really got some dads, huh?
It's a miracle we're not both strippers.
translation.zh: ‎我们没有双双去跳脱衣舞真是奇迹

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah.
Look, your dad was a cop, so you became a crook.
translation.zh:
‎你看 你爸是警察
‎所以你成了诈骗犯

translation.en: My dad was a crook, so I became a cop.
translation.zh: ‎我爸是诈骗犯 于是我成了警察

translation.en: We're not that different.
I'm not asking you to care about me, Booth.
translation.zh: ‎我不是要你在乎我 布斯

translation.en: I'm asking you to help me.
Help me catch The Bishop and clear my name,
translation.zh: ‎帮我抓住主教 洗清我的罪名

translation.en: and I will help you become the number one art thief in the world again.
translation.zh:
‎我会帮你重新成为
‎世界第一的艺术品窃贼

translation.en: It's the only chance I have to get my life back.
translation.zh: ‎这是我夺回人生的唯一机会

translation.en: Please.
April, 1945.
The Red Army's at the gate, days from taking Berlin.
translation.zh: ‎红军兵临城下 几天后就要攻打柏林

translation.en: It's game over for the Nazis,
and that's when a forgotten Mr. Nobody named Rudolph Zeich,
translation.zh: ‎这时 被人遗忘的鲁道夫采什

translation.en: Hitler's personal art and antiquities dealer,
translation.zh: ‎希特勒的私人艺术品及古董商人

translation.en: and the only man ever rumored to have held Cleopatra's third egg
translation.zh:
‎据说他是唯一
‎把克里奥佩特拉的第三颗蛋

translation.en: in his hands,
hopped a steamer ship and fled Germany for Argentina.
translation.zh:
‎他搭乘一艘蒸汽船
‎从德国逃往阿根廷

translation.en: The manifest shows he traveled with just a single suitcase.
translation.zh: ‎乘客信息显示 他只带了一个手提箱

translation.en: Oh, and sixteen five-ton cargo containers logged only as holding machine parts.
translation.zh:
‎还有16个五吨货物集装箱
‎仅仅登记为“机械零件”

translation.en: Now, why would an art dealer leave his patron's side
translation.zh:
‎为什么一个艺术品商人
‎要离开他的老板

translation.en: and travel halfway around the globe,
with nearly 100 tons of so-called machine parts?
For 70 years, amateur sleuths, treasure hunters,
translation.zh:
‎70年来
‎各地的业余侦探、宝藏猎人

translation.en: and adult virgins everywhere became obsessed with this question,
translation.zh: ‎和成年处子对这个问题感到着迷

translation.en: obsessed with finding what they believed had to be Hitler's lost bunker,
translation.zh:
‎想要找到他们认为的
‎希特勒失落的地堡

translation.en: hidden somewhere in South America.
And my dad was one of them.
He'd spend weekends holed up in his office,
translation.zh: ‎他会花上好几个周末窝在办公室

translation.en: poring over old maps and declassified files.
translation.zh: ‎仔细研究旧地图和解密档案

translation.en: Holidays, he'd drive hours away to obscure auctions,
translation.zh:
‎节假日 他会开车好几个小时
‎去隐秘的拍卖会

translation.en: where he'd bid on the strangest things.
Including a watch.
And not just any watch. Creepy Nazi art guy Rudolph Zeich's watch.
translation.zh:
‎那不是一块普通的表  ‎而是可怕的
‎纳粹艺术品商人鲁道夫采什的表

translation.en: That same watch my father chose to love more than me.
translation.zh: ‎就是我爸选择爱它胜过爱我的那块表

translation.en: What a dick.
Never wanted anything to do with his treasure hunt,
translation.zh:
‎我从不想
‎和他古怪的宝藏狩猎扯上关系

translation.en: even after he passed.
That was my father's thing, and he could have it.
translation.zh: ‎那是我爸的东西 他拿去好了

translation.en: But when I discovered what was inside it,
translation.zh: ‎但我发现了藏在里面的东西后

translation.en: I knew right then that I held in my hand
translation.zh: ‎我马上就知道 我手里的

translation.en: the secret to the third egg's location.
[Hartley] Booth, you've had me traveling for three days
translation.zh: ‎布斯 你让我奔波了三天了

translation.en: and hiking in circles for eight hours.
That map better be right.
[Booth] Relax, we'll find it.
[Hartley] Say we find it.
How can you be sure the egg is actually there?
-[Booth] What do you mean? -I get that Rudolph the red-nosed Nazi guy
translation.zh: ‎什么意思？ ‎我知道红鼻子纳粹鲁道夫

translation.en: is rumored to be the last person to ever hold the egg in his hands,
translation.zh: ‎据说是最后一个碰过那颗蛋的人

translation.en: and that this mystery bunker is rumored to have all this stolen treasure.
translation.zh:
‎据说这个神秘的地堡里
‎有所有被盗的宝物

translation.en: How can you be sure the third egg itself is actually there?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么就能确定 第三颗蛋在这里？

translation.en: Faith.
Faith?
I'm sorry, I just wanna be clear.
So we're out in the middle of nowhere based on faith?
translation.zh:
‎我们来到荒无人烟的地方
‎是因为信念？

translation.en: Or "gut vibe" if you're not into the whole religious thing.
translation.zh:
‎或者说是“直觉”
‎如果你对宗教没兴趣的话

translation.en: No.
You know, the kinda thing I'm into is a good plan.
A smart plan, the opposite of this.
translation.zh: ‎一个明智的计划 和现在正相反

translation.en: Relax. I have good news. If I'm reading this map right…
translation.zh: ‎冷静 我有好消息 ‎如果我没看错地图

translation.en: We're here.
-We're where? -We've arrived.
X marks the spot.
X… What spot? X marks the spot.
We're here. Here it is. Great job!
translation.zh: ‎我们到了 是这里 干得好！

translation.en: -Please don't yell at me. -You found it! Booth found it.
translation.zh:
‎-请不要吼我
‎-你找到了！布斯找到了

translation.en: There's no bunker. There's shit here.
-I'm just telling you what the map says. -There's no bunker.
translation.zh:
‎-我只是告诉你地图画的位置而已
‎-没有地堡

translation.en: Tell me, what does the map say?
Oh, shit!
Yeah, it's gonna be a long walk back.
You know what I blame? I blame the compass.
translation.zh: ‎你知道要怪什么吗？怪指南针

translation.en: I got this thing back in Scouts. It's been a little wonky.
translation.zh:
‎这玩意是我童子军时期用的
‎有点迟钝了

translation.en: It was never my strong suit.
-Can I see this? -Absolutely.
-Can I see this? -Of course.
I see what the problem is.
-That's the problem. -Oh. That is not kind.
You know what's not kind? Dragging me out in the middle of nowhere,
translation.zh:
‎你知道还有什么不友好吗？
‎把我拉到鸟不拉屎的地方

translation.en: halfway around the world, based on a goddamn hunch!
translation.zh: ‎绕地球半圈 靠他妈的直觉！

translation.en: [Booth] Holy shit!
Guess they're paying the utilities.
It's gotta be hydroelectric power,
which means there's running water somewhere down here.
translation.zh: ‎也就是下面某个地方肯定有流水

translation.en: Look at that door. Nothing hiding behind there.
translation.zh: ‎看看那扇门 后面肯定什么都没有

translation.en: How are we gonna get through this?
Oh, shit!
You have got to be kidding.
Is that your father's watch?
No. It's the watch from Pulp Fiction.
translation.zh: ‎不是 这是《低俗小说》里的手表

translation.en: Yes, it's my father's watch.
-I thought you said you smashed it. -I had it repaired. Is that a problem?
translation.zh: ‎我以为你说你砸了的 ‎我找人修好了 有问题吗？

translation.en: No, it's not a problem. Glad you're not touchy about it.
translation.zh:
‎不 没问题
‎很高兴你对它没有很敏感

translation.en: Please shut up.
Uh, fun with magnets. All right.
Dad…
Please be good crazy.
Forget the egg, let's just steal this stuff.
translation.zh: ‎别管那颗蛋了 我们偷这些东西吧

translation.en: [Hartley] We're not here to steal anything.
Uh, actually we are. We're here to steal the egg.
translation.zh: ‎其实我们确实是来偷的 偷蛋

translation.en: [Hartley] You know what I mean.
[Booth] Oh, I steal it, it's stealing, and you steal it, it's what?
translation.zh: ‎我偷就是偷 你偷是什么？

translation.en: How about we just shut up? And by we, I mean you.
translation.zh:
‎不如我们都闭嘴吧？
‎我说的我们指的是你

translation.en: [Booth] You're also rude too.
Rude to boot.
[Hartley] How are we gonna find this egg?
[Booth] I don't know.
Look for a box that says "MacGuffin."
Do you know what this is?
This is…
Yes, this is a 1931 Mercedes-Benz Grosser 770.
I could flip this for $25 million, easy.
translation.zh:
‎这辆我可以轻松转手
‎以两千五百万美元卖出去

translation.en: There's, like, three of these left on the planet. Four!
There's four now.
Three quarter-inch steel,
reinforced armor-plating, bullet-resistant glass,
translation.zh: ‎加强装甲钢板 防弹玻璃

translation.en: and a 24-karat gold inlay.
This is a convertible tank.
And it's in mint condition. I bet you this thing still runs.
translation.zh:
‎而且车况完美
‎我跟你打赌 它还能开

translation.en: Too bad it was driven by Nazi scum.
translation.zh: ‎它被纳粹人渣开过真是太遗憾了

translation.en: It's a shame we're gonna have to burn it.
translation.zh: ‎我们不得不烧掉它 多可惜

translation.en: How did they get it down here anyway?
They carry it down the stairs in tiny pieces and reassemble?
translation.zh: ‎他们把小零件运下楼再重新组装的？

translation.en: Through there.
Place must have been built off one of those old copper mines.
translation.zh:
‎这里一定是在
‎某个旧铜矿的基础上建起来的

translation.en: The shafts down here are massive and go on for miles.
translation.zh: ‎这里的通风井很大 延绵好几公里

translation.en: Build the bunker, bring in the loot, seal the shaft…
translation.zh: ‎建地堡 送来战利品 封闭通风井…

translation.en: Bob's your uncle.
Who's your daddy?
[Hartley] That's not how it goes.
[Booth] I know.
Well, labels, Nazis, dum-dums.
Five-second rule.
It's fine. Totally fine. Not a scratch on it.
translation.zh: ‎没事 完全没事 一道划痕都没有

translation.en: Are you sure you don't wanna flip this one? I got a guy.
translation.zh:
‎你确定不想把它转卖掉吗？
‎我有个熟人

translation.en: Let me save you the trouble.
Your entrances are bullshit.
Egypt? [scoffs]
Did you really think I ran right off to the pyramids on your good word?
translation.zh:
‎你以为你说两句话
‎我就真的跑去金字塔了？

translation.en: All I had to do was wait for you two to escape from Sotto Voce,
translation.zh: ‎我只需等你们两个逃离低语者

translation.en: and you led me right to the third egg,
which I'm going to take from you now.
translation.zh: ‎现在我就要从你们手中拿过来

translation.en: So, uh, hand it over.
Come on, don't be shy.
[mockingly] Good job. Attaboy.
Drop your weapon!
[in Spanish] This way! On that side.
[in English] How did she find us?
I followed you. She must have followed me.
translation.zh: ‎我尾随你们 她一定是尾随了我

translation.en: No shit!
Why are you shooting at them? I thought you were on their side.
translation.zh:
‎为什么对他们开枪？
‎我以为你和他们是一边的

translation.en: I am on their side. They shot at me first.
translation.zh:
‎我是他们那边的
‎但他们对我先开了枪

translation.en: How are we gonna get out of here?
We take that.
I don't think that's gonna make it up the stairs.
-[cocks gun] -It ain't going up the stairs.
Cover us.
-Go, go, go! -I'm trying!
Let's go.
Let's go!
-Throw it. -What?
Now!
[Das in Spanish] You two with me, the rest of you follow.
translation.zh: ‎你们两个跟我来 剩下的跟上

translation.en: Go!
[in English] I'm all out.
[in Spanish] Pull over!
-[male officer] Shit! -[engine revving]
[in English] Bishop, the egg!
[Booth] You saved me.
You love me. You love me like crazy.
-Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! -Shit!
We're running out of road.
Hold on to something! If we stop, they'll catch us.
translation.zh:
‎抓稳了！如果我们停车
‎他们会抓住我们

translation.en: Then let's get caught.
We can escape later. It works for me all the time.
translation.zh: ‎可以之后再逃跑 我一直是这么干的

translation.en: Make sure to kick clear of the car.
-I would like to workshop this idea. -Oh, shit!
translation.zh: ‎我想再讨论一下这个主意 ‎该死！

translation.en: It's just like we drew it up, right?
Hartley?
Hartley?
Hartley?
You will be missed.
Oh, shit! God damn it.
Hartley?
Hartley? Hartley?
Hey, where are you, you big idiot?
[Hartley] Who are you calling an idiot?
I'm right here.
-Did you just choose me over the egg? -No.
translation.zh:
‎-你刚刚在蛋和我之间选了我吗？
‎-没有

translation.en: -Well, it kinda looks like you did. -I didn't.
You went running in there to rescue me.
I left my phone in there.
You only have a finite amount of time to save it.
Stick it in a bag of rice, it's a whole thing.
translation.zh: ‎还要把它放进米袋 一整套操作

translation.en: You thought I was dead.
I didn't think you were dead. I wished you were dead.
translation.zh: ‎我没想着你死了 我希望你已经死了

translation.en: I saw you splashing around. "Hartley! Hartley!"
translation.zh: ‎我看你四处拍着水花喊“哈特利！”

translation.en: Yes, okay, I wanted to pull you out,
translation.zh: ‎是的 好吧 我想把你拉上来

translation.en: save you, get your hopes up, and then pull you, shove you under.
translation.zh:
‎拯救你 让你燃起希望
‎然后把你按下去

translation.en: Look, I'm not gonna make a big deal out of this.
I'm not gonna gloat. It's not who I am.
translation.zh: ‎我不会幸灾乐祸 我不是这种人

translation.en: Would some people say that this is very embarrassing for you?
translation.zh:
‎有些人是不是要承认
‎自己现在很尴尬？

translation.en: Yes, of course. Of course they would.
Probably everybody.
But that's not important right now.
What's important is that you realize you lost and I won.
translation.zh: ‎重要的是你意识到 你输了 我赢了

translation.en: We.
We won. Together. Friendship. Teamwork.
translation.zh: ‎我们赢了 一起 友谊 合作

translation.en: It's called the moral of the story.
And something that I've been wanting to say for years
to your face is…
Checkmate.
Oh, that feels good.
I've got two eggs, you've got one, and you think you won?
translation.zh:
‎我有两颗蛋 你只有一颗
‎你还觉得自己赢了？

translation.en: How's that work exactly?
I don't have to win in order for you to lose.
translation.zh: ‎并不是一定要赢 你才会输

translation.en: That's the best part of this whole thing.
translation.zh: ‎这整件事最棒的地方就在这里

translation.en: As long as I have the third egg, you can't win.
translation.zh: ‎只要我拿走第三颗蛋 你就赢不了

translation.en: I don't care about the money anymore.
Honestly, look at your face right now.
translation.zh: ‎说实话 看看你现在的表情

translation.en: That face right there. Just… Yeah. Perfect.
Resting failure face. I mean, in a word, priceless.
translation.zh: ‎天生输脸 一句话 值了

translation.en: Also, it just gets better.
As an added bonus, my friend here, at no extra charge,
translation.zh:
‎作为额外奖项
‎我的朋友不会另收费用

translation.en: is gonna give you a lifetime supply of prison.
So… [in accent] That's-a nice.
-Stand up. -Stand up.
Told you how this was gonna end.
You're right. I am the bad guy.
I know how a confidence scheme works, trust me.
translation.zh: ‎我知道信任诈骗的套路 相信我

translation.en: You don't know me, Booth.
You have no idea what I'm capable of.
What the fuck?
Look at him.
Resting failure face. Priceless.
This whole time you were working for her?
Not for, with.
-Like partners. -Yeah, we're both The Bishop.
translation.zh:
‎-是搭档
‎-是的 我们都是主教

translation.en: Has he told you where the third egg is yet?
translation.zh: ‎他告诉你第三颗蛋在哪儿了吗？

translation.en: -I love you. -I love you too.
-Ready? [grunts] -Yep.
Surprise!
There are two bishops in chess.
-And a whole lotta pawns. -Hmm.
[Hartley] I passed the first egg on to her in Bali.
translation.zh: ‎在巴厘岛 我把第一颗蛋给了她

translation.en: She took the second egg from Sotto Voce.
translation.zh: ‎她从低语者那里拿走了第二颗蛋

translation.en: And the third egg, well, the only way for us to get our hands on it
translation.zh: ‎而第三颗蛋 我们找到它的唯一方法

translation.en: was if you led us right to it, which you did.
translation.zh: ‎就是让你带路 而你做到了

translation.en: I thought for sure you were gonna see through my
"We're not partners, I gotta clear my name,
translation.zh: ‎“我们不是搭档 我要证明自己清白

translation.en: I'm Johnny Law, blah, blah, blah."
To be honest, I thought I laid it on too thick in the prison.
translation.zh: ‎说实话 我以为我在监狱演得太过了

translation.en: -No, honey, you were so good. -No? Really?
translation.zh:
‎-不 亲爱的 你特别棒
‎-是吗？

translation.en: Appreciate that. What'd you think? You think it was too much?
translation.zh: ‎多谢 你觉得呢？是不是太过了？

translation.en: I have notes. Otherwise, pretty good.
translation.zh: ‎我都记下来了 除此以外 挺好的

translation.en: "Pretty good"? All right.
Let's just rewind for one second here.
You electrocuted him. You went "Downtown."
translation.zh: ‎你电击了他 你电了“中心”

translation.en: Yes. By the way, that hurt like hell.
translation.zh: ‎是的 对了 那个非常痛

translation.en: I know. I'm so sorry. I had to.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 很抱歉 我不得不那么做

translation.en: No.
[The Bishop] It was the only way I could pass you a key to slip the cuffs.
translation.zh: ‎只有那样我才能递手铐的钥匙给你

translation.en: [sputtering] How did you get free?
Well, anyhoo, the egg.
The egg.
That gun is soaking wet. There's no way--
I'm not a Navy SEAL.
Third egg.
-Thank you. -Let's take a walk.
So it was all a lie? Even the sob story about your dad?
translation.zh:
‎都是谎言吗？
‎包括你爸那个催人泪下的故事？

translation.en: No. My dad was a con man, and I hated him.
translation.zh: ‎不 我爸确实是个诈骗犯 我恨他

translation.en: So I decided to become better than he ever was.
translation.zh: ‎所以我决定变得比他更厉害

translation.en: Beat him at his own game.
Booth, don't be too hard on yourself.
You're good, really good, better than most.
We got nothing but respect for you.
Better luck next time.
[The Bishop] We'd love to stay and chat, but we have an important wedding to attend
translation.zh: ‎我们很想留下聊天 ‎但我们要参加一场很重要的婚礼

translation.en: and it turns out, we have the perfect gift.
[Hartley] No hard feelings, pal.
It's what we do.
[clicks tongue] None taken. Super fun time, guys.
See, I always appreciate a quality double-cross.
translation.zh: ‎我一直很欣赏高水平的出卖行为

translation.en: Serious question though, you guys have any sunblock?
translation.zh:
‎但我有个严肃的问题
‎你们有防晒霜吗？

translation.en: I have no base. This is a spray tan.
translation.zh: ‎我没打底 这是喷雾美黑

translation.en: [man] A beautiful event like tonight happens only once in a father's life.
translation.zh:
‎一位父亲的一生中只会遇到一次
‎今晚这样美好的宴会

translation.en: That is why when I arranged for my only daughter to marry,
translation.zh: ‎所以 当我安排我的独生女结婚时

translation.en: I spared no expense to acquire a gift unlike any other.
translation.zh: ‎我不遗余力获得了举世无双的礼物

translation.en: A gift fit for a queen,
my Cleopatra.
Behold, for the first time in two millennia,
all three treasured eggs have been reunited.
translation.zh: ‎三颗宝贵的蛋终于首次重聚

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, my God! Ed…
[Cleopatra] Ed Sheeran!
I love you!
Ed Sheeran, who knew?
God, he's so cute.
Yeah, I like that guy.
[male officer] Attention. This is an Interpol police action.
Remain in your seats. This will be over shortly.
translation.zh: ‎坐在原位 行动很快会结束

translation.en: What are you doing?
-Cheers. -Cheers.
-Oh, my God. Don't touch me. Excuse me! -Oi!
Come on, then. Come on! Come on!
We'll take those. Thank you very much.
translation.zh: ‎这些我们拿走了 非常感谢

translation.en: -Let's get out of here. -[chuckles softly]
Possession of stolen Nazi loot is a crime.
translation.zh: ‎持有被盗纳粹掠夺品是犯罪

translation.en: You're under arrest, father of the bride.
This is outrageous.
[both grunting] Get off me. Do you know who I am? I was in Game of Thrones!
translation.zh:
‎放开我 你们知道我是谁吗？
‎我出演过《权力的游戏》！

translation.en: I'm Ed Sheeran, bitch!
[Booth] This gouda is disappointing.
Such a fancy yacht, you'd think they could stock some decent cheeses.
translation.zh:
‎游艇这么时髦
‎我还以为会有好吃的奶酪

translation.en: That's not cheese. That's uncooked pork.
I've heard tapeworms can be quite slimming.
Surprised to see me?
Well, we're just surprised it took you so long to find us.
translation.zh:
‎我们感到意外的是
‎你花了这么久才找到我们

translation.en: Oh, I actually… I came aboard yesterday.
You weren't the only one crying at the end of your lovemaking.
translation.zh: ‎你们床戏到最后的喊声有我一份

translation.en: You know, funny story, after Das picked me up on the beach…
translation.zh: ‎有趣的是 达斯在海滩上找到我后…

translation.en: Looks like you ran out of friends.
[Booth] She sent me to the only place on Earth that actually is worse
translation.zh:
‎她把我送到了地球上唯一一个 ‎真的比她Instagram账号
‎还糟糕的地方

translation.en: than her Instagram account.
translation.zh:
‎真的比她Instagram账号
‎还糟糕的地方

translation.en: But then I remembered
that I'm pretty good at escaping from things.
So I did.
Look, am I upset about what happened back on the beach?
translation.zh: ‎我对沙滩上发生的事生气了吗？

translation.en: Absolutely not. All's fair in love and eggs.
translation.zh: ‎当然没有 一切都很好 有爱又有蛋

translation.en: I came to congratulate you both.
Great. Glad you approve. What do you want?
translation.zh: ‎感谢你的认可 你想怎样？

translation.en: Well, I'm big on forgiveness. I always have been.
But I'm not so big on forget-ness.
What are you talking about?
I'm talking about my twist ending.
You know the 300 million you guys got on the eggs
before you double-crossed the billionaire?
Nice touch, by the way.
Anyhow, I gave our friend, Inspector Das, a little jingle
translation.zh:
‎总之 我给了我们的朋友
‎达斯警官一点小提示

translation.en: and I tipped her off about that secure Cayman Island account
you stashed it in.
Turns out, it's not as secure as one might hope.
translation.zh: ‎结果那账户没有想象中那么安全

translation.en: Take it all.
[Booth] See? Now, we're even.
Everyone loses, no one gets the money and we can all be friends again.
translation.zh:
‎大家都输了 没人拿到钱
‎我们又可以做朋友了

translation.en: Cut the shit. What's the offer?
translation.zh: ‎别废话了 你有什么条件？

translation.en: There's a new score.
Double the payout, triple the challenge, plus, here's the best part.
translation.zh:
‎资金翻倍 挑战翻三番
‎另外最棒的地方来了

translation.en: It's a three-thief job. [mouthing] One, two, three.
translation.zh:
‎这是三人合作的盗窃工作
‎一、二、三

translation.en: And let me guess, if we don't say yes,
translation.zh: ‎我猜猜 如果我们不同意

translation.en: then Inspector Das is on her way right now to arrest us.
translation.zh: ‎达斯警官已经在来抓我们的路上了

translation.en: Yes, in very fast boats.
Know what I think is funny, Booth?
translation.zh: ‎知道我觉得哪里好笑吗 布斯？

translation.en: Vin Diesel's audition tape for Cats? It exists.
translation.zh:
‎范迪塞尔面试《猫》的视频？
‎真的存在

translation.en: The fact that you think the two of us would ever team up with you.
translation.zh: ‎就是你以为我们会再次与你合作

translation.en: Get off the boat.
Great. I'll, uh, send you both a sharpened toothbrush.
translation.zh:
‎很好 我会给你们
‎一人寄一把削尖的牙刷

translation.en: Wait, stop.
[sighs] Look, we need a new score now anyway.
translation.zh: ‎反正我们现在也需要偷新目标

translation.en: I know he drives you crazy, but he's good.
translation.zh: ‎我知道他让你烦躁 但他挺厉害的

translation.en: -And you two work well together. -No, we don't.
translation.zh:
‎-你们俩合作无间
‎-不 并没有

translation.en: We kinda do.
Do you trust me?
Always.
-You love me? -Big time.
That's all we need.
[both] What are we stealing?
This.
[in Italian] It's abandoned. They're not here.
Ready?
What could possibly go wrong?
Everything.
[The Bishop] Don't miss me too much.
[sing-song] Ta-ta!
